lead_paragraph: Egypt’s police might want to beware of satirists bearing gifts, after a comedian managed to smuggle some dissent into Tahrir Square on Monday.
snippet: Egypt’s police might want to beware of satirists bearing gifts, after a comedian managed to smuggle some dissent into Tahrir Square on Monday.

headline.main: Egyptian Satirist Threatened for Giving Police Condom Balloons
